channel.title: Convert An Xbox Controller Into Pc And A Pc Kill Switch
channel.description:
This is a tut on converting an xbox controller to pc and a kill switch
NOTE: I made this into a pic for a test :D
[img]http://i101.photobucket.com/albums/m63/N0valyfe_2006/Tut-1.jpg[/img][br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 05:36:04 PM[/size][hr]16+ views and not 1 reply -.-

item.title: Convert An Xbox Controller Into Pc And A Pc Kill Switch
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

h44ckzor pwnage:

100+ Views and this many replies, you fucking leachers

I don’t have a xbox. I don’t have a xbox controller, I looked here out of interest, to see if it messed with electronics, as I do that. I’m a teenager, I mess with electronics and play with fire, it’s what a lot teenagers aged 13 and over do.

item.source: Convert An Xbox Controller Into Pc And A Pc Kill Switch

item.title: Convert An Xbox Controller Into Pc And A Pc Kill Switch
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

h44ckzor pwnage:

Don’t know, Try it.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 29, 2007, 03:36:38 AM[/size][hr]Should work because the laptop would have a usb :D[br][size=1]Posted on: January 29, 2007, 04:08:44 AM[/size][hr]100+ Views and this many replies, you fucking leachers

What do you want people to say?

For one thing you didn’t write this tutorial, so how are we the leechers? Second of all, as interesting as this is, I have my doubts that anyone here has done this as it requires many materials and of course the risk of ruining a perfectly good xbox controller. In conclusion, I would like to say you fail.

Read full topic
